title: Weredolphin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Splash your target. You may do this on both a new moon and a full moon. You cannot do this on a Hunting Moon.
- During a Full Moon, Deal a powerful attack to all splashed targets

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- Although splashing a player isn't astral, Attacking all splashed targets is.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Splashing a target changes their investigative result to your investigation results
- You cannot splash other weres

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
**Marine Call**
Automatically kill all Splashed targets. In addition, deal a basic attack to their visitors.
